TEXT.FORM: @diwuhui to-mda tɕe, kɯki @diwuhui ki nɯ, @sunwukong @dazhan @erlangshen, "@erlangshen cho tu-olɯlɤt-ndʑi" to-mda ɲɯ-ŋu. tɕendɤre @yuhuangdadi nɯnɯ kɯ /pjɤ/ ɲɯ-sɤŋo tɕe, @sunwukong kɯ li @pantaohui nɯnɯ li /to-sɤtʂoʁloʁ/, (020 pjɤrɯŋɯŋɤn?) tɕendɤre iɕqha, nɤkinɯ, nɯ to-sɤtʂoʁloʁ tɕe iɕqha nɯ jo-ɕe. mɤʑɯ iɕqha, @laojun ɣɯ ɯ-@jindan nɯ to-mɯrkɯ tɕe to-ndza kɤ-ti nɯ pjɤ-mtshɤm. tɕendɤre wuma ʑo ɯ-mbrɯ to-ŋgɯ, tɕe nɯɕimɯma ʑo nɤki to-ɣɤxpra, @tuotalitianwang to-ɣɤxpra tɕe, khrɯtsu sqi ɣɯ ɯ-ʁmaʁmi to-sɯndo. (040) tɕendɤre iɕqha, @sunwukong ɯ-kɯ-ndo jo-sɯxɕe, @huaguoshan nɯtɕu. tɕe @litianwang nɯ kɯ nɤki, iɕqha /mkhɤrmaŋ nɯ kɯ/, tɯrme nɯ kɯ-dɯ-dɤn nɯ to-ndo tɕe, nɤki, @huaguoshan nɯtɕu zɯ ko-rɤʑi-nɯ, jo-zɣɯt-nɯ tɕe tɕendɤre, @huaguoshan nɯ rca, pjɤ-fskɤr-nɯ tɕe, tɯ-ci kɯnɤ ʑo mɤ-kɯ-ɕri kɯ-fse to-βzu-nɯ. (100) tɕe pjɤ-fskɤr-nɯ. tɕeri nɤkinɯ, @jiuyaoxingguan nɯnɯ, kɯ-mɤku jo-ɕe tɕe nɤkinɯ, @sunwukong cho kɯ-ɤlɯlɤt jo-ɕe tɕe, @tiaozhan ɯ-kɯ-βzu jo-ɕe ri tɕe, jɤ-azɣɯt tɕe nɤki, ɣzɯ kɯ-dɯ-dɤn nɯra nɯ-ɕki to-ti: "jɤ-ɕe-nɯ tɕe, nɯʑo ra ɣɯ, nɤki, ɣzɯ kɯ-nɯku nɯnɯ, z-jɤ-sɯɣe-nɯ tɕe, @touxiang a-ɣɯ-nɯ-βze" to-ti, tɕe "pɯ-nŋo-a" a-ɣɯ-tɤ-ti ra ma nɯmaʁnɤ iʑora, nɤkinɯ tɕetha, ji-jaʁ tu-joʁ-i ŋu' (142) iɕqha "kɤ-ɤlɯlɤt tu-sɤʑa-j ŋu" to-ti. tɕeri nɤkinɯ, ɣzɯ ɯ-pɯ nɯra jo-ɕe-nɯ tɕe, iɕqha praʁ ɯ-ŋgɯ lo-ɕe(-nɯ) tɕe, nɤki, ɕ-to-ti-nɯ. (150) tɕeri @sunwukong chondɤre @qishierdong,kɯɕnɯsqamnɯz ɣɯ, nɤki, praʁ ɣɯ, nɤki, nɯ-rɟɤlpu nɯnɯ, ɬɤndʐi ra nɯ-rɟɤlpu nɯ cho cha pjɤ-k-ɤsɯ-tshi-ndʑi. tɕendɤre iɕqha ɣzɯ ɯ-pɯ nɯra kɯ ta-tɯt nɯra pa-mtshɤm ri, pjɤ-mtshɤm ri, @sunwukong nɯ kɯ maka mɯ-pjɤ-nɯβdaʁ. mɯ-pjɤ-nɯβdaʁ tɕe to-ti kɯ, cha ɣɤʑu, tɕe jisŋi lu-βzi-a ɕti. tɕe nɯ jisŋi cha kɯ-tu tɕe, cha kɯ lu-kɯ-sɯβzi ɕti, nɤki, kɯm ɯ-pɕi zɯ tɕhi kɯ-fse ʑo ku-nnɯ-ŋu ku-nnɯ-maʁ pɯ-nɯ-tu nɯ kɤ-nɯkon kɯ-tu me" to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu. (245) tɕendɤre toʁde tɕe, toʁde tɤ-tsu tɕeri, ɣzɯ ɯ-pɯ ci li jo-ɣi tɕe to-ti tɕe, "e a-wɯ, mɯ-to-pe nɤ, mɯ-to-pe!" iʑora ji-kɯm, nɤkinɯ, nɤkinɯ, pjɤ-qrɯ-nɯ" to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu. (255) tɕendɤre iɕqha, nɤkinɯ, fsraŋma kɯ-χɕɯ-χɕu nɯnɯra lɤ-ɣe-nɯ ɕti" to-ti. tɕe "kɯ-sɤsat lɤ-ɣe-nɯ ɕti" to-ti. tɕe @sunwukong kɯ pa-mtshɤm tɕendɤre to-sɤmbrɯ. tɕe /kɯ/ kɯkɯra sna kɯ-me kɯra, tɤ-rme kɯ-fse ɣɯ, nɯnɯra kɯ-ŋɤn, kɯ-rɯŋɯŋɤn nɯra, nɯ-tɯ-sɤnɤkhe ɲɯ-tɕhom!" to-ti. tɕe @sunwukong kɯ @jingubang to-ndo tɕe, iɕqha nɯ, akɯ nɯ ko-rtɤβ, andi nɯ ɲɤ-rtɤβ. tɕendɤre iɕqha, ʑŋgri ɣɯ, iɕqha, nɯ-ŋgumdʑɯɣ nɯnɯra, kɤsɯfse ʑo, nɤki, pjɤ-ɕɯnŋo tɕe, /chɤ/ ɲɤ-ɕɯphɣo. tɕe jɤ-phɣo-nɯ pjɤ-ra ɲɯ-ŋu tɕe, tɕe nɯ ɯ-mphru tɕe tɕe, @litianwang nɯ kɯ li, @sidatianwang chondɤre @ershibaxingxiu nɯnɯra, nɤkinɯ, kɯ-sɤqur jo-sɯɣe. kɯ-sɤqur jo-sɯɣe tɕe tɕendɤre, @sunwukong kɯ, ri, @sunwukong kɯ ɯ-βra nɯ, @sishierdong, kɯɕnɯsqamnɯz ɣɯ, nɤki, praʁ ɯ-ŋgɯ ɬɤndʐi kɯ-fse nɯra, mɤʑɯ ndɤre, nɯ ɯ-ŋgɯ zɯ li nɯ-kɯ-mna, nɤkinɯ, kɯβde pjɤ-tu tɕe, nɯra kɤsɯfse jo-ɣi. (510) tɕendɤre nɯ-jaʁ nɯtɕu, iɕqha nɯ li, @jingubang tɯkaka pjɤ-k-ɤsɯ-ndo-nɯ-ci tɕe tɕendɤre, @sidatianwang chondɤre @nezhasantaizi nɯnɯra, nɤkinɯ, chɤ-znɯqhastɯstu pjɤ-cha. tɕendɤre ɯ-fsosŋi tɕe, ci nɯra jo-sɯxɕe ɕti tɕe, @tuotalitianwang nɯnɯ ɣɯ @ertaizi, ɯ-tɕɯ stu nɯ kɯ-wxti ɣɯ ɯ-pa nɯ kɯ, @mucha pjɤ-rmi tɕe nɯnɯ kɯ laʁjɯɣ pjɤ-k-ɤsɯ-ndo-nɯ-ci tɕe, ɯ-ŋga ra ko-sɤsɯɣ tɕe, tɕendɤre jo-ɣi. tɕendɤre nɯnɯ jo-ɣi tɕendɤre, kɯ-saqur jo-ɣi. (630) tce nɯ kɤ-ti ta-sthɯt tɕe tɕendɤre, nɤki, @sunwukong cho li kɤ-ɤlɯlɤt to-sɤʑa-ndʑi tɕeri, nɯnɯ @hui'an nɯnɯ, @sunwukong ɣɯ, maka ʑo nɯ kɤ-nɯʁɤri mɯ-pjɤ-rtaʁ. tɕeri toʁde kɯ-xtɕɯ-xtɕi ci ʑo, nɤkinɯ, to-sɤʑa-ndʑi jamar ma mɯ-pjɤ-tsu ri, tɕendɤre, li jo-nɯphɣo pjɤ-ra ma mɯ-pjɤ-cha. tɕendɤre @litianwang kɯ, ku-rtoʁ tɕe, @mucha nɯnɯ kɤ-βʁa mɯ-pjɤ-cha tɕe tɕendɤre, nɯɕimɯma ʑo, nɤkinɯ, iɕqha nɯnɯ, jo-sɯɣe nɯnɯ, ɯ-tɕɯ nɯ /kɤs/ kɤ-βʁa mɯ-pjɤ-cha tɕe tɕendɤre (708, ja-sɯɣe, jo-sɯɣe) nɤki, iɕqha nɯ, @yuhuangdadi ɯ-ɕki tɯrme jo-sɯxɕe tɕe, "ji-kɯ-qur jɤ-ɣi-nɯ ma mɯ́j-cha-j" to-ti. tɕe @yuhuangdadi nɯ kɯ nɯnɯ /jɤ/ tɤscoz jɤ-kɤ-sɯɣɯt nɯ ta-rtoʁ tɕe wuma ʑo pjɤ-nɤscɤr. tɕe "kɯki maka, nɤki, ɣzɯ kɯ-xtɕɯ-xtɕi nɯnɯ ɣɯ nɯnɯ, ɬɤndʐi kɯ-fse nɯ kɯ, kɯsthɯci, nɤkinɯ, ɯ-kɤ-cha ɲɯ-dɤn ɯ-ɲɯ́-ŋu, ɲɯ-cha ɲɯ-dɤn ɯ-ɲɯ́-ŋu?" to-ti. tɕendɤre tɕe, /ɕɯ/, tɕe ɕɯ ju-sɯxɕe-a ɲɯ-ra nɤ?" to-ti ma, (740) "cha" nɯ-kɤ-sɯso nɯra, jo-sɯxɕe ra lonba pjɤ-nŋo-nɯ. tɕe nɯra chɤ-rɯsɯso ri, iɕqha, @guanyinpusa nɯ kɯ to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu tɕe, nɤkinɯ, "nɤʑo ji-βɣo ra, nɤki, nɤ-sɯm nɯ-ɣɤβdi, mɤ-ʁdɯɣ nɯ, nɤʑo nɤkinɯ, jɤ-tɯ-sɯxɕe-t ɣɯ, iɕqha, nɤ-ftsa nɯnɯ, @erlangshen nɯ jɤ-sɯ??? tɕe, nɯnɯ cha thaŋ" to-ti. "aʑo nɯthamtɕɤt rgɯnba pɯ-mto-t-a ri, nɤkinɯ, ɯ-qhuchu @qigan kɯ-ɤtsa kɯ-tu nɯ mɤɕtʂa mɯ-pɯ-mto-t-a tɕe, aʑo ɯ-ŋgɯ lu-ɕe-a mɤ-pe" nɯra ɲɤ-sɯso. tɕendɤre kɯ-mɤku pɤjkhu ɯ-khɯɣɲɟɯ nɯra ci pjɯ-phɯt-a tɕe" to-ti. tɕendɤre nɯ koʁmɯz nɤ, ɯ-kɯm nɯra /pjɯp/ tɯ-qartsɯ??? tu-lat-a tɕe pjɯ-phɯt-a" ɲɤ-sɯso. (1300) tɕendɤre @sunwukong nɯ pjɤ-nɤscɤr. tɕe nɯ ɲɯ-ʑɣɤɣɤɣɤme. (1305 ipfv?) tɕendɤre iɕqha nɯ, li @erlangshen ɣɯ ɯ-ʁzɯɣ kɯ-fse ɲɤ-ʑɣɤsɤβzu, @sunwukong nɯ. nɯ kɯ-fse ɲɯ-ʑɣɤsprɯt tɕe tɕendɤre, iɕqha, ɯ-ʁɤri nɯtɕu, nɤkinɯ, li tɯ-ci kɯ-wxtɯ-wxti chɯ-kɯ-ɣi ci pjɤ-tu tɕe, nɯ ɲɤ-ʑɣɤsɤβzu tɕe, nɯtɕu jo-zɣɯt. tɕe @erlangshen kɯ nɯnɯ nɯɕimɯma ʑo ɯ-kɯ-βɟi jo-zɣɯt. (1330) tɕendɤre @yuhuangdadi kɯ wuma ʑo pjɤ-k-ɤz-nɤjo-ci ri, nɯ tɯ-tɕha ɯ-kɯ-ɣɯt pjɤ-me. tɕendɤre hanɯni ɲɤ-nɯzdɯɣ tɕe tɕendɤre, nɤki, iɕqha, @shenxian, fsraŋma kɯ-dɯ-dɤn nɯra to-ndo tɕe, @nantianmen nɯtɕu iɕqha, kɯ-ɤlɯlɤt ɯ-kɯ-nɤmɲo chɤ-ɬoʁ-nɯ. tɕeri iɕqha @taishanglaojun kɯ iɕqha, @yuhuangdadi ɯ-ɕki to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu. "aʑo @erlangshen /ɣɯ/ ci tu-qur-a ɲɯ-ntshi" to-ti. tɕe ɯ-ti tu-tɯ-sthɯt tɕe tɕendɤre @jingangquan kɤ-ti nɯnɯ, iɕqha kɯ-ɤrtɯ-rtɯm ɲɯ-ŋu woma, nɯnɯ to-ndo. tɕendɤre nɯnɯ to-ndo tɕe tɕendɤre nɤki, ɯ-pa zɯ pjɤ-βde, ki to-stu tɕe pjɤ-βde tɕe tɕendɤre, @sunwukong nɯnɯ, nɯnɯtɕu tɕe tɕendɤre, tɤlɯlɤt nɯ /pjɤ/, nɤki, ku-raχtsur pjɤ-ɕti, ku-naχpɯχpjɤt pjɤ-ɕti, (1425) nɯra mɯ-to-nɯkon tɕe, tɕe nɯ @jingangquan nɯnɯ, kɯ ɯʑo pjɤ́-wɣ-ɕɯrqoʁ. (1430) tɕendɤre ɯʑo pjɤ́-wɣ-ɕɯrqoʁ qhe ci pjɤ́-wɣ-tʂaβ. tɕe pjɤ́-wɣ-tʂaβ tɕe tɕendɤre tɕe "nɯɕimɯma ʑo /tu-rɤru/ tu-rɤru-a ra tɕe ju-phɣo-a ra" ɲɤ-sɯso ri, tɕe iɕqha khɯna nɯ kɯ ɯ-mi ko-mtsɯɣ. tɕe ɯ-mi ko-mtsɯɣ qhe, @sunwukong nɯ ɯ-thoʁ nɯtɕu pjɤ-ndʐaβ. tɕe to-nɯjʁo tɕe, "nɤʑo khɯna, /pɯkɯ/ kɯ-si ɯ-spa khɯna nɯ, tɕhindʐa nɤʑo kha ma-ɕɯ-tɯ-rɯre kɯ, (1455 mɤ-ɕɯ-tɯ-rɯre) kutɕu a-kɯ-mtsɯɣ, aʑo @laosun nɤkinɯ, a-kɯ-mtsɯɣ tɯ-ɣi ra" to-ti. tɕeri kɯ-maqhu qhendɤre, nɤkinɯ, @erlangshen chonɤ @meishanliuxiongdi nɯra kɯ, nɯnɯ kɤndʑixtɤɣ kɯtʂɤɣ nɯra kɯ, @sunwukong nɯnɯ pjɤ-ɲcɤr-nɯ. pjɤ-ɲcɤr-nɯ qhe tɕendɤre /to/ to-rŋgɤβ-nɯ. tɕendɤre tɯmɯ kɤrŋi to-tsɯm-nɯ. tɕe nɯ kɯ-fse to-tsɯm-nɯ tɕe tɕe kɯki pjɤ-jɤɣ. @diwuhui nɯ tɕe pjɤ-jɤɣ. tɕe nɯtɕu tɕe @sunwukong pjɤ-nŋo. matɕi nɯthamtɕɤt kɯ kó-wɣ-nɯtshɤβ.
